trans-unit.source: Provides the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form" /> adapter for the Wireless Markup Language (WML) device adapter set.
trans-unit.target: 为无线标记语言 (WML) 设备适配器集提供 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Form" /> 适配器。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">ASP.NET 移动应用和网站</see>。

trans-unit.source: for operating in a hosted environment.
trans-unit.target: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />; Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />；权限值：<see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Minimal" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlFormAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.WmlFormAdapter" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of postback values.
trans-unit.target: 返回回发值的集合。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of postback values.
trans-unit.target: 回发值的集合。

trans-unit.source: Override this method if you need to collect the values of any postback variables in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要收集的任何控件中的回发变量的值，重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个对关联控件的强类型引用。

trans-unit.source: A strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 一个对关联控件的强类型引用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Name of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理事件，则返回 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已处理事件，则 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The text writer to receive output.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收输出的文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached, using the provided writer.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的编写器为控件适配器所附加到的控件生成特定于目标的标记。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: The specified <see langword="< card >" /> attributes.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <see langword="< card >" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see langword="< card >" /> tag.
trans-unit.target: 呈现 <see langword="< card >" /> 标记。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation renders a `< card >` element with the given attributes.
trans-unit.target: 基实现呈现`< card >`具有给定属性的元素。

trans-unit.source: Inheriting adapters can override this method and modify the dictionary of attributes, before calling the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 继承适配器可以重写此方法，并在调用基实现之前修改的属性，字典。

trans-unit.source: The text writer.
trans-unit.target: 文本编写器。

trans-unit.source: Renders any additional markup immediately following the <see langword="< card >" /> tag in the WML deck.
trans-unit.target: 呈现紧跟在 WML 卡片组中的 <see langword="< card >" /> 标记后的任何附加标记。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已过时。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.

trans-unit.source: Inheriting classes can override this method to customize output.
trans-unit.target: 继承类可以重写此方法以自定义输出。

trans-unit.source: The text writer
trans-unit.target: 文本编写器

trans-unit.source: Renders the pager user interface for the form.
trans-unit.target: 呈现窗体的页导航用户界面。
